actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-617.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 400) to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior, subject to the supervision and approval of the Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial Commission, to proceed with the construction of the Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 400 (Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 400) to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior, subject to the supervision and approval of the Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial Commission, to proceed with the construction of the Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial, and for other purposes.
